description: This file defines the Tooltip class for Bootstrap v3.2.0, implementing tooltip UI components with methods for initialization, content management, positioning, and event handling.

classes.name: Tooltip
classes.description: Class implementing tooltip behavior, including show, hide, position, and content management.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the tooltip with type, element, and options.

methods.name: getDefaults
methods.description: Returns default options for the tooltip.

methods.name: getOptions
methods.description: Merges default options, data attributes, and passed options.

methods.name: getDelegateOptions
methods.description: Returns options for delegated tooltip instances.

methods.name: enter
methods.description: Handles mouseenter or focusin events to show the tooltip.

methods.name: leave
methods.description: Handles mouseleave or focusout events to hide the tooltip.

methods.name: show
methods.description: Displays the tooltip with positioning and animation.

methods.name: applyPlacement
methods.description: Positions the tooltip element based on calculated offsets.

methods.name: replaceArrow
methods.description: Adjusts the position of the tooltip arrow.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the tooltip content based on title.

methods.name: hide
methods.description: Hides and detaches the tooltip.

methods.name: fixTitle
methods.description: Removes the title attribute to prevent default browser tooltips.

methods.name: hasContent
methods.description: Checks if tooltip has content.

methods.name: getPosition
methods.description: Calculates the position of the element.

methods.name: getCalculatedOffset
methods.description: Calculates the offset for positioning the tooltip.

methods.name: getViewportAdjustedDelta
methods.description: Adjusts tooltip position to stay within viewport.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Retrieves the tooltip title from data or options.

methods.name: getUID
methods.description: Generates a unique ID for the tooltip.

methods.name: tip
methods.description: Returns the tooltip DOM element.

methods.name: arrow
methods.description: Returns the arrow element within the tooltip.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Validates if the element is still in the DOM.

methods.name: enable
methods.description: Enables the tooltip.

methods.name: disable
methods.description: Disables the tooltip.

methods.name: toggleEnabled
methods.description: Toggles tooltip enabled state.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles tooltip visibility.

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Destroys the tooltip instance.
